 Three Small time crooks who happen to be brothers (Nicolas Cage, Dana Carvey and Jon Lovitz) pull of a bank robbery in a town called Paradise. As they desperately try to get out of town, the three became trapped by a snow storm and the unexpected kindness of the townsfolk of the nicest town on earth. They soon realize they have no choice but to put all the money they&#039;ve stolen back in the bank. Now if they can just slip away from their new friends long enough to break back in.
